item.title: How to Configure High Availabilty Kubernetes Cluster on Ubuntu 20.4
item.description: On this occasion I will share how to configure High Availability Cluster Kubernetes on Ubuntu using HAProxy and Keepalive. We use Keepalive and HAproxy for load balancing and high availability. Things that need to be prepared include: Hosts/Instances/VM Configure HAproxy and Keepalive Configure Kubernetes clustering using Kubeadm. Architecture Clusters. Here we use 3 masters, 3 workers, 2 load balancers, and 1 IP to be used as a Virtual IP Address.
